summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered to J Epstein & Co Inc. It includes multiple entries for shipments made between July 27 and August 2, 1999, with various individuals associated with the company listed as senders and recipients.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the owner of J Epstein & Co Inc, which is the account holder for the FedEx services detailed in the invoice.

keyFacts: The invoice details transportation charges totaling $263.92 for services rendered to J Epstein & Co Inc.
Multiple employees of J Epstein & Co Inc are listed as senders for various packages.
The invoice includes several entries for packages picked up and delivered between July 27 and August 2, 1999.
